channel.title: Blog on Kelvin Hsu
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Kelvin Hsu

item.title: Best Student Paper Award at ECML 2018
Dean's Faculty Award for Outstanding Tutoring
item.description: The greatest gift from the act of teaching is the lesson of empathy. Before someone can understand you, you must first understand them. Teaching has truly taught me so many important lessons. It teaches me about the beauty of constrasting experiences and thoughts. It teaches me about that communication is always a two way street. It teaches me that the audience and their frame of mind is always the most critical to the success and effectiveness of a presentation.
